title: Tata Curvv EV interior to have Nexon.ev like features. Check details
description: Tata Motors unveiled the interior of the Curvv EV, set to launch on August 7 in India. The car features a 12.3-inch touchscreen infotainment system, advanced safety features, and a range of 600 km. A petrol and diesel version will follow, competing with the Hyundai Creta and Kia Seltos.
